alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Floyd; Patrick (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:38PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Floyd, northeastern Carroll, west central Henry and northeastern Patrick Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 538 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Charity to near Dugspur. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hillsville... Floyd... Woolwine... Willis... Bassett... Dugspur... and Laurel Fork. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
